text: Jean-Claude Henri Schindelholz (born 11 October 1940) is a Swiss former footballer. He played as a striker. At club level, he played for FC Moutier, Servette FC (1963–1971) and Vevey-Sports (1971–1973). He also played for the Switzerland national team. He played one game for Switzerland at the 1966 FIFA World Cup. Schindelholz was born in Courrendlin. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:1966 FIFA World Cup players Category:Swiss footballers Category:People from the canton of Jura
title: Jean-Claude Schindelholz
